title: Pixel 2 in "Qualcomm HS-USB QDLoader 9008" state
content: I plugged in Pixel 2 overnight and when I went to use it, I had to turn it on even though I didn't tun it off the night before, it wouldn't turn on. I tried all the options from the website https://support.google.com/pixelphone/answer/7167687?hl=en&ref_topic=7084611&vid=0-1040951604527-1549312990756 with no luck... When I plug it into my computer it shows up as: Qualcomm HS-USB QDloader 9008.
